# The `SwingSchedulerDDGEdge` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

Represents a dependence between two instruction.

Definition at line 119 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### SwingSchedulerDDGEdge() {#afb31935c5b586aefe79b47d172a5746c}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::SwingSchedulerDDGEdge::SwingSchedulerDDGEdge (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sunit">SUnit</a> &#42; PredOrSucc, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdep">SDep</a> &amp; Dep, bool IsSucc)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Creates an edge corresponding to an edge represented by <code>PredOrSucc</code> and <code>Dep</code> in the original DAG.

This pair has no information about the direction of the edge, so we need to pass an additional argument <code>IsSucc</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h/#l00129">129</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### ignoreDependence() {#a7ceeb69a98ceced68af8215b02cecbb2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="bool SwingSchedulerDDGEdge::ignoreDependence (bool IgnoreAnti) const">
Returns true for DDG nodes that we ignore when computing the cost functions.

We ignore the back-edge recurrence in order to avoid unbounded recursion in the calculation of the ASAP, ALAP, etc functions.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h/#l00190">190</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepipeliner-h">MachinePipeliner.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp/#l03751">3751</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepipeliner-cpp">MachinePipeliner.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
